name: Khal Muhammadi 2.5x4 FT Rug No. 1211
shortDescription: Khal Mohammadi rugs are Handmade Afghan Rugs. Actually Khal Mohammadi is a person (not a place or region) who developed the red tones found in these rugs. These rugs are very attractive & 100 % wool Rugs.
